article_title: Thanuja Murugesan Appointed as Chief Secretary of the Northern Province
article_body_paragraphs:
President Anura Kumara Disanayake has appointed Ms. Thanuja Murugesan as the new Chief Secretary of the Northern Province.
The official letter of appointment was presented to her this afternoon (20) at the Presidential Secretariat by Secretary to the President, Dr. Nandika Sanath Kumanayake.
